languages.text: "Что этот охальник опять бормочет? Судя по его гнусной роже, не восхваления Всеотцу".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Что этот охальник опять бормочет? Судя по его гнусной роже, не молитвы Императору".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."
languages.original_text: "Что этот охальник опять бормочет? Судя по его гнусной роже, не восхваления Всеотцу".

traits.locale_text: "What is that old slyboots muttering now? Judging by that fulsome mug of his, it's not praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old slyboots muttering now? Judging by that fulsome mug of his, it's not praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old slyboots muttering now? Judging by that fulsome mug of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old slyboots muttering now? Judging by that fulsome mug of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."
"What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

languages.text: "Was murmelt die alte Laus schon wieder? Seinem geschmacklosen Gesicht nach zu urteilen, ist es kein Lobgesang auf den Allvater."
languages.original_text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: "Was murmelt die alte Laus schon wieder? Seinem geschmacklosen Gesicht nach zu urteilen, ist es kein Lobgesang auf den Allvater."
"Was murmelt der alte Schlauberger Trottel da wieder? Seinem geschmacklosen Gesicht nach zu urteilen, ist es kein Lobgesang auf den Allvater."

languages.text: « Mais qu'est-ce que ce vieux croulant marmonne encore ? Vu son rictus satisfait, j'imagine qu'il n'est pas en train de rendre hommage au Père de tout. »
languages.original_text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: « Mais qu'est-ce que ce vieux croulant marmonne encore ? Vu son rictus satisfait, j'imagine qu'il n'est pas en train de rendre hommage au Père de tout. »
« Mais qu'est-ce que ce croulant marmonne encore ? Vu son air satisfait de lui-même, j'imagine qu'il n'est pas en train de rendre hommage au Père de tout. »

languages.text: “那只臭虱子在嘀咕什么呢？他脸上的笑容真是让人厌恶，肯定不是在赞美全父。”
languages.original_text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: “那只臭虱子在嘀咕什么呢？他脸上的笑容真是让人厌恶，肯定不是在赞美全父。”
“那个老滑头在嘀咕什么呢？从他那张讨人厌的丑脸来看，他肯定不是在赞美全父。”

languages.text: «¿Qué murmura ese viejo borracho? Con esa mueca tan obsequiosa, no pueden ser las alabanzas del Padre de Todo».
languages.original_text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué murmura ese viejo borracho? Con esa mueca tan obsequiosa, no pueden ser las alabanzas del Padre de Todo».
«¿Qué murmura ese viejo taimado? Con esa cara tan obsequiosa, no pueden ser las alabanzas del Padre de Todo».

languages.text: 「あのずる賢い年寄り、今度は何をブツブツ言ってるんだ？あのやけに調子のいいツラを見るに、どうやら全知の父を讃えてるわけじゃなさそうだな」
languages.original_text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: 「あのずる賢い年寄り、今度は何をブツブツ言ってるんだ？あのやけに調子のいいツラを見るに、どうやら全知の父を讃えてるわけじゃなさそうだな」
「あのずる賢い年寄り、今度は何をブツブツ言ってるんだ？あのやけに調子のいいツラを見るに、どうやら全知の父を讃えてるわけじゃなさそうだな」

languages.text: "Şu ihtiyar böcek şimdi ne mırıldanıyor? O koca suratına bakılırsa Yücebaba'yı övmediği bariz."
languages.original_text: "What is that old louse muttering now? Judging by that fulsome sneer of his, it's not the praises of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: "Şu ihtiyar böcek şimdi ne mırıldanıyor? O koca suratına bakılırsa Yücebaba'yı övmediği bariz."
"Şu ihtiyar kurnaz şimdi ne mırıldanıyor? O koca suratına bakılırsa Yücebaba'yı övmediği bariz."
